file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-29-05-04 - GALLEY LIGHT BALLASTS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL GALLEY LIGHT BALLASTS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the galley light ballasts. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 33-29-05-000-801-A GALLEY LIGHT BALLASTS - REMOVAL GALLEY LIGHT BALLASTS - INSTALLA- ALL 33-29-05-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-29-05 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-29-05-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. GALLEY LIGHT BALLASTS - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the galley light ballasts. (2) This task is applicable to the removal of the forward/aft galley light ballasts (installed on the service-door region ceiling panel) and the outboard galley light ballast (installed on the main- door region ceiling panel). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-803-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 233 233ALC Main-door region ceiling panel 234 234ARC Service-door region ceiling panel D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-004-A (1) On the RH electrical-power control/distribution box, open these circuit breakers and attach DO-NOT-CLOSE tags to them: • GALLEY LIGHTS (Location tip: RB GND SERV BUS 2/GALLEY LIGHTS). • AFT GALLEY (Location tip: RB SHED DC BUS 2/AFT GALLEY). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-29-05 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) (For EMB-145() MODELS) Remove the main-door region ceiling panel or service-door region ceiling panel, as applicable (AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-801-A/400). (3) (For EMB-135() MODELS) Remove the main-door region ceiling panel or service-door region ceiling panel, as applicable (AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-802-A/400). (4) (For EMB-135SL MODELS) Remove the main-door region ceiling panel or service- door region ceiling panel, as applicable (AMM TASK 25-22-04-000-803-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 020-004-A CAUTION: MAKE MATCH MARKS ON ALL THE ELECTRICAL WIRES OR CABLES BEFORE YOU DISCONNECT THEM. INCORRECT CONNECTION OF WIRES OR CABLES WILL CAUSE DAMAGE TO EQUIPMENT. (1) Disconnect the two electrical connectors (4) (5). (2) Remove the screw (6) and washer (7) that attach the ballast (8) to the ceiling panel. (3) Remove the screw (1), lock washer (10), and washers (2) (9) that attach the terminal lug (3) to the ballast (8). (4) Remove the ballast (8). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-29-05 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-29-05-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. GALLEY LIGHT BALLASTS - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the galley light ballasts. (2) This task is applicable to the installation of the forward/aft galley light ballasts (installed on the service-door region ceiling panel) and the outboard galley light ballast (installed on the main-door region ceiling panel). B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION ELECTRICAL BONDING TEST - STANDARD PROCE- AMM TASK 20-13-21-700-801-A/200 DURES TYPES OF ELECTRICAL BONDING AND SURFACE AMM TASK 20-13-21-910-801-A/200 PREPARATION - STANDARD PROCEDURES ELECTRICAL BONDING PROTECTION - STANDARD AMM TASK 20-13-21-910-802-A/200 PROCEDURES AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-801-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-802-A/400 - AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-803-A/400 - AMM TASK 33-29-00-700-801-A/500 GALLEY LIGHTS - OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 233 233ALC Main-door region ceiling panel 234 234ARC Service-door region ceiling panel D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-29-05 Page 6 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Installation (Figure 401) (Figure 402) SUBTASK 420-004-A (1) Do the bonding procedure, method 3 (AMM TASK 20-13-21-910-801-A/200). (2) Put the ballast (8) in position. (3) Tighten the screw (6) and washer (7) that attach the ballast (8) to the ceiling panel. (4) Connect the terminal lug (3) to the ballast with the screw (1), lock washer (10), and washers (2) (9). (5) Tighten the screw (1), lock washer (10), and washers (2) (9) that attach the terminal lug to the ballast. (6) Do the bonding test (AMM TASK 20-13-21-700-801-A/200) on the galley light ballast (8). (7) Do the bonding protection ( AMM TASK 20-13-21-910-802-A/200). CAUTION: REFER TO THE MATCH MARKS MADE DURING THE REMOVAL WHEN YOU CONNECT THE ELECTRICAL WIRES OR CABLES. INCORRECT CONNECTION OF WIRES OR CABLES WILL CAUSE DAMAGE TO EQUIPMENT. (8) Connect the two electrical connectors (4) (5) to the ballast (8). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-004-A (1) (For EMB-145() MODELS) Install the ceiling panel (AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-801-A/ 400). (2) (For EMB-135() MODELS) Install the ceiling panel (AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-802-A/ 400). (3) (For EMB-135SL MODELS) Install the ceiling panel (AMM TASK 25-22-04-400-803-A/ 400). (4) On the RH electrical-power control/distribution box, remove the DO-NOT-CLOSE tags from these circuit breakers and close them: • GALLEY LIGHTS (Location tip: RB GND SERV BUS 2/GALLEY LIGHTS). • AFT GALLEY (Location tip: RB SHED DC BUS 2/AFT GALLEY). (5) Do an operational test of the galley lights ( AMM TASK 33-29-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-29-05 Page 7 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
